submissionSteps: Fill listing fields using marketplace-title.txt, marketplace-short.txt, marketplace-tags.json, marketplace-keywords.json, marketplace-faq.md, and marketplace-listing.md.
Attach release-notes.md and confirm version/changelog consistency.
Adapter note: This template uses Node20 runtime with prebuilt dist/index.js.
Adapter note: Run npm run build before each release commit.
Submit in marketplace sandbox and validate before production publish.
